page.title: 16GAMES AT JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Boys play football in winter and cricket in summer. Girls play netball and hockey. Other games are 'British Bulldog', where one person has to stand in between two lines and the other children have to try and cross between the two lines without being caught. Another game is 'Foxy', where one person has to stand facing a wall and other children have to try and kill the fox without being caught. They are caught if the fox turns round and sees them move. 'Hide and Seek' is a popular game with as many players as required. One person covers his eyes and counts up to a set number, while the other people hide. He then has to try and find the missing people. A final game is 'Pig in the Middle', where two people throw a ball to each other and the person in the middle has to try and stop it.
